message.entry: Linear algebra is not supported for integer data types. To operate on each element of the matrix individually, use LDIVIDE (.\) for elementwise left division.
Arguments must be 2-dimensional, or at least one argument must be scalar. Use LDIVIDE (.\) for elementwise left divide or use PAGEMLDIVIDE to apply left matrix division to the pages of N-D arrays.
Sparse single array operations are not supported.
